about_the_game:
This downloadable content includes:
  • Gnashville Lycans Team – this is an all-werewolf team led by Dyan Rammakill at QB and a bruising power run game featuring All-Star RB Derrick Frenzy carrying the rock. On defense, the team is ferocious, and can sink its fangs into any opponent’s offense. The Lycans are rampaging beasts howling for a playoff run.
  • NewSin Stadium – play against or as the Lycans in NewSin Stadium, located deep in a dark and foreboding forest set under a full moon. This grim stadium is packed with dangerous field hazards, and cursed goal posts that make every field goal attempt a nightmare.
  • “Blood, Fur and Lightnin'” – The Lycans’ home musical theme song.

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.
This content requires the Dynasty Edition or the Werewolf Rampage Pack DLC in order see players as werewolves.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League and its addons features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

detailed_description:
This downloadable content includes:
  • Gnashville Lycans Team – this is an all-werewolf team led by Dyan Rammakill at QB and a bruising power run game featuring All-Star RB Derrick Frenzy carrying the rock. On defense, the team is ferocious, and can sink its fangs into any opponent’s offense. The Lycans are rampaging beasts howling for a playoff run.
  • NewSin Stadium – play against or as the Lycans in NewSin Stadium, located deep in a dark and foreboding forest set under a full moon. This grim stadium is packed with dangerous field hazards, and cursed goal posts that make every field goal attempt a nightmare.
  • “Blood, Fur and Lightnin'” – The Lycans’ home musical theme song.

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.
This content requires the Dynasty Edition or the Werewolf Rampage Pack DLC in order see players as werewolves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
